meanings.definition: The animals of a particular region or period considered as a whole.
meanings.sent1: The faunae of the forest include deer, rabbits, and squirrels.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the faunae of the Arctic to understand its ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The faunae decided to have a picnic in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The faunae of the ocean danced gracefully in the waves.
meanings.sent5: The diverse faunae of the savannah painted a beautiful natural picture.

meanings.definition: The animal life of a particular region or time.
meanings.sent1: The faunae in prehistoric times were very different from those today.
meanings.sent2: Explorers were amazed by the exotic faunae they encountered in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The faunae threw a surprise party for the zookeeper.
meanings.sent4: The faunae of the past whispered stories of ancient mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant faunae of the rainforest buzzed with life and energy.
